description: According to research by the University of Michigan, it is reading fiction that helps activate new areas of the brain and develop imagination. However, while playing on a computer, these same areas of the brain remain unused.
Creativity. Solving problems. Flexibility and mobility. Continuous training. This is all that will accompany the creation of a glider in which you can track your business

Control your calorie balance and the amount you eat. Eat regularly. Keep an eye on the variety of food. Vegetables and fruits - every day. Limit the sugar. Don't 'drink' calories. Make a menu for the week. Set the table, create a pleasant environment for eating

A sedentary lifestyle spoils the health of the youngest people with a large reserve of strength from nature. Boys and girls get fatter, become stooped, get used to looking askance at their peers with toned figures and making sarcastic comments. All this makes them unattractive to interesting people of the opposite sex, worsens their character, reduces the chances of a long life and the creation of a happy couple
Music will make you smarter. Music will help you become a sought-after specialist. Music lessons will make you more confident
It's very simple here - become happier
